exclusion.criterion: Any other vaccination given within 2 weeks before first IMA950 vaccination.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of immunodeficiency or active autoimmune disease requiring systemic treatment within the past 3 months or a documented history of clinically severe autoimmune disease, or a condition other than glioblastoma that requires systemic steroids (> 10mg/day prednisone or equivalent) or immunosuppressive agents.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients with evidence of history bleeding diathesis.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant or breastfeeding patients, or expecting to conceive or father children within the projected duration of the trial, starting with the pre-screening or screening visit through 120 days after the last dose of trial treatment.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Has a known additional malignancy that is progressing or requires active treatment.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Is currently participating and receiving study therapy or has participated in a study of an investigational agent and received study therapy or used an investigational device within 4 weeks of the first dose of treatment.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Has a known history of active TB (Bacillus Tuberculosis)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Hypersensitivity to pembrolizumab or any of its excipients.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Has had a prior anti-cancer monoclonal antibody within 4 weeks prior to study Day 1 or who has not recovered (i.e., ≤ Grade 1 or at baseline) from adverse events due to agents administered more than 4 weeks earlier.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Has had prior chemotherapy, targeted small molecule therapy, or radiation therapy within 2 weeks prior to study Day 1 or who has not recovered (i.e., ≤ Grade 1 or at baseline) from adverse events due to a previously administered agent.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Has known history of, or any evidence of active (non-infectious) pneumonitis that required(s) steroids.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Has an active infection requiring systemic therapy.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and is currently undergoing treatment, which may make them ineligible for the trial.
